page.title: 05W.WILTS TRADING ESTATE
page.content: The most important development that has taken place in Westbury over the past 10 years has been that involving the West Wilts Trading Estate lying to the north of the town. This is a private trading estate development, leases of various lengths being granted to a multitude of small and larger companies; light industry on a large scale. Companies specialise in the requirements of the building industry,agriculture and the motor trade,with repair firms, auction rooms and road haulage companies with both nationwide and international interest. There are warehousing facilities available to nationally known companies and the electronics, heating and oil distribution industries are catered for. An internationally known packaging company (see page 06) is also found here.
